title: More FC test cases
body:
[Notes for myself]

- `should_update_justified_checkpoint`:
    - `compute_slots_since_epoch_start(get_current_slot(store)) == SAFE_SLOTS_TO_UPDATE_JUSTIFIED`
        -  `and get_ancestor(store, new_justified_checkpoint.root, justified_slot) == store.justified_checkpoint.root`
        -  `and get_ancestor(store, new_justified_checkpoint.root, justified_slot) != store.justified_checkpoint.root`
do we want to get this into the test suite prior to the Bellatrix spec release coming soon?
